title: Logan Paul channels inner Rocky as he gets ripped for KSI rematch
text:
‘Let’s go champ’ (Picture: Getty)

Logan Paul is taking things up a notch as he prepares for the big rematch against KSI.

The star has been channeling his inner Rocky as he poses and trains for the cameras, sporting a USA flag mouth guard.

Because nothing says patriotism like being hit in the mouth?

Pictured cooling down after his workout showcase (which is apparently a thing) at Wild Card Boxing Club in LA, he manifested the outcome as he sported a ‘champion’ tee.

We can literally hear Shannon Briggs’ cheers of ‘Let’s go, champ’ ringing through our heads.

He’s clearly not lacking in energy (Picture: Getty Images North America)

However, he clearly hadn’t used up all his energy as he dropped to the floor in the splits in one shot, grinning at the cameras with his mouth guard in place.

It’s safe to say the 24-year-old is looking pretty ripped after his best friend Mike Majlak told Metro.co.uk he’s ‘literally training for war.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘There are no distractions, there are no girls at the house,’ he said. ‘He’s in bed by 10, no questions asked.’

Following the draw last year, the YouTubers are going pro for the boxing match and forgoing head-guards – so nastier injuries are to be expected all round.

The star is gearing up for the final two weeks of training (Picture: Getty Images)

However, Logan’s already been joking that he’s suffered brain damage from the hits he’s taken to the head.

After teaming up with Snapchat in his series called Countdown To Fight Night where he talks techniques, training, and tips ahead of his fight against KSI, he revealed sparring is taking its toll.

He showed off his regime at a workout showcase (Picture: Getty Images)

He said: ‘Sparring is a fast track to success because you get good quicker… However, it’s dangerous.

‘It’s very taxing on the body. You’re getting hit in the head constantly. Boxing is a sport that goes hand-to-hand with brain damage. I don’t know if you can tell, but I think I’m already suffering from it.’

However, it seems KSI – real name Olajide ‘JJ’ Olatunji – won’t let his opponent go down without a fight after his best pal Calfreezy claimed he’s ‘never been in better shape’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I haven’t seen what [Logan] gets up to but I have seen what JJ gets up to…I think it will show how much dedication, how much training goes into this,’ he explained to Metro.co.uk, before describing KSI’s training regime as ‘absolutely mental’.

description: Logan Paul gets ripped for KSI boxing rematch after insults traded at London press conference.
